name: Bug Squish
description: In Bug Squish the player has to protect their own arm from blood-sucking insects. Using a fly-swatter (controlled by the mouse or a touch screen) they need to be squished before they suck you dry. There are 32 waves, with various bug types, and occasional "extra blood" and score multiplier bonuses. It is based on the Macintosh shareware game Blood Suckers.
alsoFor: BeOS, Linux, Macintosh, Windows | Combined View
